text: يَقْدُمُ قَوْمَهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَأَوْرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْوِرْدُ ٱلْمَوْرُودُ

translation.en.sahih: He will precede his people on the Day of Resurrection and lead them into the Fire; and wretched is the place to which they are led.
translation.id.indonesian: Ia berjalan di muka kaumnya di hari kiamat lalu memasukkan mereka ke dalam neraka. Neraka itu seburuk-buruk tempat yang didatangi.
